mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.wtid AS "wtid",
a.hfnr AS "hfnr", a.hfnrxml AS "hfnrxml", a.sfhf AS "sfhf", a.hftime AS "hftime", a.remark AS "remark", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.ssgzr AS "ssgzr", a.hzid AS "hzid", a.ffidea AS "ffidea"
mapper.select:
SELECT s.name AS "deptid", u.name AS "userid", w.wtclyj AS "wtclyj",
FROM c_ins_business_zdxmwthf a LEFT JOIN c_ins_business_zdxmwt w on w.id=a.wtid LEFT JOIN SYS_AREA s on s.id=a.deptid LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u on u.id=a.userid where w.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_ins_business_zdxmwthf( id, wtid, deptid, userid, hfnr, hfnrxml, sfhf, hftime, remark, createtime, ssgzr, hzid, ffidea ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{wtid}, #{deptid}, #{userid}, #{hfnr}, #{hfnrxml}, #{sfhf}, #{hftime}, #{remark}, #{createtime}, #{ssgzr}, #{hzid}, #{ffidea} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_ins_business_zdxmwthf SET wtid = #{wtid}, deptid = #{deptid}, userid = #{userid}, hfnr = #{hfnr}, hfnrxml = #{hfnrxml}, sfhf = #{sfhf}, hftime = #{hftime}, remark = #{remark}, createtime = #{createtime}, ssgzr = #{ssgzr}, hzid = #{hzid}, ffidea = #{ffidea} WHERE id = #{id}
